about_the_game:
Original soundtrack from Phantom Signal game. Composed by Alexander Berdin-Lazursky.

Track list:
1. Awakening
2. Celestial Nymph
3. Centri
4. Cone C’Bani
5. Gullveig IV
6. Medeina
7. Pathfinder
8. Stellar Horizon

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 230 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.6+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 230 MB available space

name: Phantom Signal – Original Soundtrack
